summary: A new entry module (frontend/src/entry.tsx) was added and frontend/index.html was updated to load it, which aligns with the goal of mounting the app even if src/main.tsx is broken. However, the diff summary indicates multiple unrelated frontend changes (including to immutable paths and user-facing content), and it also appears to add new routes/pages/features beyond the blank-page mounting fix.

missing_requirements.requirement: Do not modify any files in the immutable frontend paths; if an entry-point change is required, implement it via a new entry module and update frontend/index.html instead of editing frontend/src/main.tsx.
missing_requirements.reason: The diff summary explicitly lists modifications to immutable paths (e.g., frontend/src/main.tsx, frontend/src/index.css, and frontend/src/components/ui/* is implicated by theme/component changes). REQ-21 requires zero edits to immutable paths.

missing_requirements.requirement: No user-facing text is changed as part of this fix (only mounting/bootstrapping behavior).
missing_requirements.reason: frontend/index.html’s <title> is user-facing text and appears to be (re)specified/changed as part of the diff. Also, the diff summary suggests new/changed page content (e.g., Tracking page 'Coming Soon'), which goes beyond mounting/bootstrapping behavior.
evidence: frontend-file-summaries.txt (describes many page/content files like HomePage, TrackingPage, etc.)

hallucinated_features.description: Substantial site redesign/content and multi-route app changes (TanStack Router with five routes/pages: Home, About, Services, Contact, Tracking) beyond fixing the blank render/mounting behavior.
hallucinated_features.reason: BuildRequest explicitly states non-goals: no new pages or new business features, and no design/theme/content changes beyond what is necessary to fix blank render.
evidence: frontend-file-summaries.txt ("frontend/src/App.tsx": TanStack Router setup for five routes; multiple page components listed)

hallucinated_features.description: Added shipment tracking feature elements (tracking page and React Query hook fetching shipment details).
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested; explicitly disallowed as 'new business features' and 'non-goals'.

hallucinated_features.description: Large-scale styling/theme updates (new global styles, Tailwind config branding changes).
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested; non-goal says avoid changing design/theme/content beyond what’s necessary to fix blank render.

hallucinated_features.description: Added/changed contact form validation utilities and related UI components.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by REQ-20/REQ-21; constitutes new/expanded functionality beyond mounting fix.

hallucinated_features.description: Updated/introduced package manifest and broad dependency/tooling changes.
hallucinated_features.reason: Not requested by the BuildRequest; may be unrelated to entry-point mounting fix.
